document.full_text: hollywood darling ryan gosling gets spattered in blood and fuel in danish film noir "drive," delighting cannes critics who whooped at the film's odd blend of hollywood dazzle and deadpan nordic humour.
document.title: blood, fuel power gosling debut at cannes festival
